Title: The Good, The Bad & The Milo
Plot: Milo decides it is time to break it off with Molly, but he doesn't want to leave on bad terms. Tyler and Gibbs don't see eye to eye with the owner of their favorite restaurant. And Neal is asked to fire an employee, but he doesn't have the guts to do it.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Meredith Hagner, Sarah Wright, Maz Jobrani, J.P. Manoux, Mandy McMillian, Jason B. Stamey
